text: The pound-based unit is a categorized type of mass unit.
The unit based on stone is a type of mass unit.
A quarter-based unit is a type of mass unit.
The unit known as a hundredweight is a type of mass unit.
The ton is a unit that is used to measure mass.
The slug-based unit is categorized as a type of energy unit.
The unit based on a teaspoon is a type of volume unit.
The area density unit is of a type that is based on the gram per square meter.
The large calorie-based unit is a type of energy unit.
The Gray per minute is a unit that is used to measure the absorbed dose.
